channel.title: Corruption-X - New Server, All skills working
channel.description:
Corruption-X is a new 718 server (03/02/2014)
JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum
Features: PvP: -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking
Skilling: -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed
Donatorzone: -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items
Other information: -Lots of commands, -Few Custom Items, -Prestige system (sorted shops), -Custom Clothes Changer, -Custom Clothes Colour Changer, -Full Summoning obelisk, -Custom emote commands.
Pvm: -Nex [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b613/khaki10/1_zps0f04b16b.png[/img] -Corp [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b613/khaki10/2_zps3d2bd64b.png[/img] -GWD
- Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i1294.photobucket.com/albums/b613/khaki10/4_zpse7ba6ddd.png[/img] -Nomad
-DKS
-Sea Troll Queen
-there's more!
JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum JOIN US --------- http://corruption-x.enjin.com/forum
